data.message: Repair broken audit chain integrity in Duro MCP server: Successfully migrated 6 entries to chain_version 1 with proper SHA-256 hashing and prev_hash linkage. Created backup, meta-audit record, and frozen migration script. Chain now validates completely.
data.task: Repair broken audit chain integrity in Duro MCP server
data.outcome: Successfully migrated 6 entries to chain_version 1 with proper SHA-256 hashing and prev_hash linkage. Created backup, meta-audit record, and frozen migration script. Chain now validates completely.
